backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for VibeStream defining core types (UserProfile, Post, Comment, Hashtag) and implementing social features including profiles, posts, comments, likes, follows, trending, and hashtag management with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the LoginScreen redesign feature (animated branding, feature carousel, inline ProfileSetupModal wizard) to its affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short summaries describing each component's purpose and notable bug fixes applied during the build.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the VibeStream PWA, setting viewport meta tags, theme color, PWA manifest link, and mounting the React app at the root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for VibeStream specifying app name, display mode, theme/background colors, and icon paths for 192×192 and 512×512 sizes.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first strategy for API/ICP calls, with install-time pre-caching and old cache cleanup on activate.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating the full auth and navigation flow: splash screen → login → inline profile setup wizard → main layout, using Internet Identity state and React Query for profile loading.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Home, Explore, Upload, Profile) using typed LucideProps icons, active state styling, and a gradient upload button.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: A slide-up panel component for viewing, adding, and deleting comments on a post, with loading skeletons and identity-gated input.
frontend/src/components/EditProfileModal: A modal form for editing a user's profile username, bio, and avatar, including image upload with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/ExploreView.tsx: An explore page with a debounced search bar that switches between a trending posts grid and tabbed search results for users and posts.
frontend/src/components/FeedView.tsx: A vertically scrollable full-screen feed of video/photo posts that tracks the active item index and supports jumping to a specific start index.
frontend/src/components/HeartAnimation.t: A short-lived floating heart SVG animation component that calls an onDone callback after 800ms.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: The root layout component that renders the active tab view (feed, explore, upload, or profile) alongside the bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/PostOverlay.tsx: An overlay rendered on top of a post displaying the author info, caption, and optimistic like/comment action buttons.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A multi-step modal (username, bio, photo) for new user registration that validates input, handles avatar upload with progress tracking, and calls the registerUser mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: Displays a user's profile page with avatar, stats, posts grid, and follow/unfollow controls, supporting both own-profile and other-user views with edit and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/UploadView.tsx: A post creation view that lets users select a video (max 3 min) or image, add a caption with hashtags, and upload it via the createPost mutation with progress feedback.
frontend/src/components/VideoPostCard.ts: A full-screen media card component that auto-plays/pauses video based on active state, supports double-tap to like with heart animation, mute toggle, and opens a comments panel.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, and expose the current identity and login status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, posts, comments, and feed, using the ICP actor and Internet Identity for authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining the VibeStream dark theme with OKLCH CSS variables, Tailwind layers, glassmorphism utility classes, neon glow effects, and scroll-snap feed layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page component displaying the VibeStream branding, an animated rotating feature showcase, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/registerServiceWorker.ts: Registers a service worker in production environments and listens for update events to detect new content availability.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with VibeStream brand colors, OKLCH-based design tokens, custom fonts, neon box shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the VibeStream project state including architecture notes, existing features, and requirements for a mobile-first PWA social media app built with React/TypeScript frontend and Motoko backend on Internet Computer. Defines the dark neon theme, authentication approach, and all implemented feature IDs.
